feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
